name: Final Fantasy XI: The Vana'diel Collection
storyline: Begin your journey into the world of Vana’diel by creating a customized character from a host of physical attributes and jobs. Experience missions, quests, and boss battles by yourself or join up with other party members to form powerful alliances as you explore the incredibly vast environments that make up Vana’diel. The inclusion of the Rise of the Zilart, Chains of Promathia, and Treasures of Aht Urhgan expansion packs expand the storyline and allow an even greater variety of jobs, higher-level skills, and abilities.
summary: This is a collection of the original Final Fantasy XI Online game along with two expansion packs: Rise of the Zilart and Chains of Promathia. The first European Windows version already included the two add-ons, but The Vana'diel Collection was released under this name in Europe as well as in North America. In Japan, it is known as All-In-One Pack.
